thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com
thread.title: Joyce

author: Joyce
title: Joyce
text: I had been looking for a new oak buffet for our dining room and could not find anything here in the States that would match existing table and chairs. I had looked at my buffet on OFL for over a month before I decided to order and I am so glad I did!! Just as they state - all solid oak and very well made. I was worried that it would get damaged during shipping but it was so well packed it arrived unscathed. Delivery team kept us well informed and no problems at all. It did arrive 12 days late but with the holidays I expected a slight delay. Customer service staff was very friendly and helpful. I felt the price was exactly what I wanted to pay for this item of furniture and am very happy with my purchase - I would order again from this company.
